title: SBT GRVL Commits to Separate Start for Elite Women in 2025
content:
Elite female gravel pros react with gratitude and relief: "We've seen women have new opportunities when this is implemented," says Paige Onweller. "I really believe it allows more women to enter the sport."

Read the full article at SBT GRVL Commits to Separate Start for Elite Women in 2025 on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
